name: csw.eodc.eu
description: Catalogue Service (CSW) from Open Geospatial Consortium for discovering and accessing metadata of ESA missions Sentinel-1, Sentinel-2, and Sentinel-3. Allows filtering and selection by temporal and spatial extent, and supports standardized search for geospatial data. Facilitates discovery and retrieval via APIs such as CSW 2/CSW 3, OpenSearch, OAI-PMH, and SRU.
